class_notes:
Must enroll in Chem 202L. Must complete OCCP or Chem 150.
Student must enroll in CHEM_OX 202L first, then in CHEM_OX 202. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
course_description: This course provides a basic understanding of the kinetics and thermodynamics associated with reactions, how these are related to the structures of reactants and products and the pathway between them, and how reactivity can be collected through choices of reacting molecules and conditions. Students who withdraw from the lecture must withdraw from the co-requisite laboratory course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 150 and CHEM_OX 150L prerequisites & CHEM_OX 202L corequisite.Student must enroll in CHEM_OX 202L first, then in CHEM_OX 202. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
